author: dougm
msg: wrap APR::password_validate to be more perl-ish (as stas suggested),
rather than return apr_status_t, return true if valid, false otherwise

author: dougm
msg: add Apache::Util::parsedate compat alias to APR::Date::parse_http

author: dougm
msg: rename ht_time to format_time for the moment to provide 1.x ht_time
compat since we now require a pool

author: dougm
msg: use a pure-perl version of Apache::Util::escape_html until
ap_escape_html is reworked to not require a pool
